JOB DESCRIPTION: Roles and Responsibilities  Skills (Front-end Developer -Develop and maintain Responsive & Mobile HTML pages for Qatar Airways) Ability to take a PSD/mock or concept and turn it into a working experience with pixel perfect perfection. Should have minimum 4 years solid working experience in creating interactive Responsive Web & Mobile pages using HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, jQuery, SASS / LESS, Bootstrap etc. Should have strong knowledge in JavaScript functional programming, JQuery, Typescript, JSON/ XML. Experience in frontend technologies with single page applications. Experience in Angluar.js, Node.js. Nice-to-Have secondary skills: Working experience on Accessibility projects. Experience working in templating (Handlebars, Mustache etc.) Experience of working with Scrum and a strong Scrum Practitioner .Desired Candidate Profile Perks and Benefits
